query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		integrationeventsconfiguration {
			_id,
			id,
			integration_types,
			program_gateway_state_changed,
			program_gateway_users_state_changed,
			program_hacker_joined,
			program_hacker_left,
			program_structured_scopes_bulk_updated,
			report_agreed_on_going_public,
			report_became_public,
			report_bounty_awarded,
			report_bounty_suggested,
			report_closed_as_duplicate,
			report_closed_as_informative,
			report_closed_as_not_applicable,
			report_closed_as_spam,
			report_comment_created,
			report_comments_closed,
			report_created,
			report_custom_field_value_updated,
			report_group_assigned,
			report_manually_disclosed,
			report_needs_more_info,
			report_new,
			report_not_eligible_for_bounty,
			report_organization_inboxes_updated,
			report_pending_program_review,
			report_remediation_guidance_updated,
			report_reopened,
			report_resolved,
			report_retest_approved,
			report_retest_canceled,
			report_retest_rejected,
			report_retest_user_expired,
			report_retest_user_left,
			report_retesting,
			report_severity_changed,
			report_swag_awarded,
			report_title_changed,
			report_triage_summary_created,
			report_triaged,
			report_undisclosed,
			report_user_assigned,
			report_user_completed_retest,
		}
	}
